description: An ancient city of the Elamite, Persian, and Parthian empires of Iran. Located at modern Shush, Susa was inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List in 2015.

names.details: Sūs: A city between Baġdād and Kūfe. It is in Ḥūzistān. According to some, it is subordinate to the province of Fārs (Persia). (translated by the first creator of this entry.)
